content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, I'm pleased to meet you. Now, about the rental price, I think a reasonable price would be 1200 Euros per month. Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc. I am sure you will find it a great place to live.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, the apartment is really nice, but the rental price is too high for me. I am a student, so I am looking for a more affordable place. Can you offer me a lower price?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand that you are a student and you are looking for an affordable place. However, the location and facilities of this apartment are hard to match at a lower price. How does 1150 Euros sound? It's a fair price for the value of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your understanding. However, as a student, I have a limited budget. Can you offer me a price closer to 900 Euros per month? I promise I will take good care of the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Mr. Wang, I appreciate your promise and your understanding. However, 900 Euros is significantly lower than the fair market value of this apartment. I am willing to be flexible, but not to that extent. How about 1000 Euros per month? It's a good deal for such a centrally located, newly built apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, 1000 Euros is still a bit high for me. I am willing to pay 950 Euros per month and I am a reliable and trustworthy tenant. I will pay the rent on time every month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Mr. Wang, your reliability and trustworthiness are commendable. However, 950 Euros is still lower than the market value of the apartment. I am willing to offer 980 Euros per month as a compromise. It's a good deal for such a centrally located, newly built apartment.
